thread.title: Renton brothers charged in fatal Skyway shooting
thread.title_full: Renton brothers charged in fatal Skyway shooting | The Seattle Times

author: Jennifer Sullivan
title: Renton brothers charged in fatal Skyway shooting
text:
Two Renton brothers accused of killing a man in Skyway last week have been charged in King County Superior Court.
Marque Fluker has been charged with second-degree murder and was ordered held in lieu of $2 million bail. Jerry Fluker was charged with first-degree rendering criminal assistance and ordered held in lieu of $500,000 bail.
The victim, Le Maun Lancaster Jr., 21, was found wounded in the parking lot of the Skyway Grocery Outlet around 7:41 p.m. on Aug. 12.
While King County sheriff’s Deputy Aaron Thompson applied pressure to Lancaster’s gunshot wounds, he asked the dying man who the shooter was and was told “Marque Fluker,” according to charging documents filed Wednesday.
Most Read Stories Wind-whipped wildfire kills 3 firefighters, injures 4 near Twisp No bodies found in wreckage of Bremerton motel Cascadia fault chatters and pops with little quakes When fire chief called for help, and no one was left State cracks down on fraudulent immigration aid Lancaster told Thompson that “Fluker” was a member of the Low Profile street gang, according to the charges. Lancaster was taken to Harborview Medical Center, where he was pronounced dead.
Deputies reviewed surveillance video taken the night of the shooting and saw Lancaster get into a fight with a man not identified in charging documents.
Marque DeAndre Fluker, 23, and Jerry Allen Fluker, 27, intervened and at some point Marque Fluker pulled out gun and shot Lancaster, charges said.
After the shooting, the Fluker brothers and the man who had initially gotten into a fight with Lancaster drove away, charging documents said.
An autopsy indicated that Lancaster had been shot at least eight times.
The men are scheduled to be arraigned on the charges on Sept. 2.
Jennifer Sullivan: 206-464-8294 or jensullivan@seattletimes.com . On Twitter @SeattleSullivan .
